value:
Annual Penalty Difference Performance = Penalty Level x Expected Annual kWh x (Actual Annual Insolation / Average
Annual Insolation) - Actual kWh
legal_term:
(a) If, at the end of a Guarantee Year, the Annual Penalty Difference (as calculated below) during such Guarantee Year is a positive number, then Guarantor shall pay to Company an amount equal to the Annual Penalty Difference multiplied by the Price per kWh within thirty (30) calendar days after it has delivered the calculation of the Annual Penalty Difference to Company. For an example see attached Appendix A. 
(b) The Annual Penalty Difference for a Guarantee Year shall be calculated by Guarantor and delivered to Company within thirty (30) calendar days after the end of such Guarantee Year as follows:
Annual Penalty Difference Performance = Penalty Level x Expected Annual kWh x Actual Annual Insolation / Average
Annual Insolation - Actual kWh
poison_pill: No poison rules violations are present because the poison rules do not apply to the situation described in the text.
